form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Scott of Florida (for himself and Mrs. Moody) submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: Honoring the memories of the victims of the senseless attack at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School on February 14, 2018.

whereas.text: Whereas, on February 14, 2018, a mass shooting that took the lives of 17 teachers and students took place at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School in Parkland, Florida;
Whereas the people of the United States continue to pray for the individuals who were affected by this tragedy;
Whereas the Parkland community has shown strength, compassion, and unity over the past 6 years; and
Whereas February 14, 2025, marks 7 years since the horrific attack: Now, therefore, be it

paragraph.text: honors the memories of the victims of the senseless attack at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School on February 14, 2018, and offers heartfelt condolences and deepest sympathies to the families, loved ones, and friends of the victims;
honors the survivors of the attack and pledges continued support for their recovery;
recognizes the strength and resilience of the Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School community; and
expresses gratitude to the emergency medical and health care professionals of the Parkland community for their efforts in responding to the attack and caring for the victims and survivors.
